section.title: &rhla; Support
section.para:
&rhel; (&rhla;) Host OS KVM and/or supported &rhla; guests have been tested and qualified by &vendor; to run on &kw-hos;. Refer to the published compatibility matrix for your version of &kw-hos; at the following URL
. &vendor; is one of the largest OEMs of &rh; with follow the sun global support coverage.

formalpara.title: One Number to Call:
formalpara.para: &vendor; customers who have purchased both &kw-hos; and &rhla; subscriptions with support from &rhla; will have one number to call for troubleshooting, fault isolation and support from &vendor; technical support specialists in &kw-hos; and &rh; technologies. If the problem is isolated to &rhla; software itself the issue will be replicated on a &rh; certified platform and escalated to &rh; for resolution.

formalpara.title: A Dual Support Model:
formalpara.para: &vendor; will troubleshoot and fault isolate an issue at the &productname; software level. If &kw-hos; software is excluded as the cause of the problem, then customers who did not purchase &rhla; support from &vendor; will be directed to the vendor from whom they purchased &rhla; for continued support.
